title: Appalachian National Scenic Trail: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Use the following pages to learn about the Appalachian Trail.  News List of important news relating to the trail. Photos & Multimedia A sample of photos and multimedia available for the trail. Nature Information about natural plants and wildlife found along the Appalachian Trail. Education Educational information related to the trail, including information about using parks as classrooms and professional development information on the Trail to Every Classroom program. Kids & Youth Information for kids and teens wanting to experience the Appalachian Trail. Management Laws, Policies and other important management information related to the trail. Brochure A link to the official Appalachian Trail map & brochure.
